title: Putting It All Together
content:
To get started:

  • Use the Astro Filter Tool to select an object from the list.
  • For each of the filters you wish to use, start by turning on each filter and selecting colors.
  • Adjust the sliders to enhance the image. Think about color-balancing the image so it clearly shows the areas or objects you wish to study.
  • Your completed image should be displayed on this page.
